H0.text: How hurricanes formed long ago can be learned by studying fossils.

H1.text: How the solar system was formed is what can be learned by studying fossils.

H2.text: The cause of strong earthquakes can be learned by studying fossils.

H3.text: How Earth's environments have changed can be learned by studying fossils.

A4.text: Subfossils are useful for studying the evolutionary history of an environment and can be important to studies in paleoclimatology.

A5.text: Subfossils are often found in depositionary environments, such as lake sediments, oceanic sediments, and soils.
